'''''Quicksand Treasure Hunter (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open 50 [[chests]] in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].
